Xor Count = 14
x[4] = x[4] ^ x[8]    y[2]
x[4] = x[4] ^ x[4]
x[2] = x[2] ^ x[12]
x[0] = x[0] ^ x[0]    y[4]
x[0] = x[0] ^ x[7]
x[1] = x[1] ^ x[1]
x[5] = x[5] ^ x[14]    y[1]
x[7] = x[7] ^ x[11]    y[3]
x[1] = x[1] ^ x[4]
x[0] = x[0] ^ x[2]    y[6]
x[4] = x[4] ^ x[15]    y[9]
x[2] = x[2] ^ x[13]
x[2] = x[2] ^ x[1]    y[7]
x[1] = x[1] ^ x[0]    y[5]
